Crime_Name: Administrative Dispute over Band Council Elections
Legal_Issue: Which band custom governs the election of the Nekaneet band council: the Referendum Band Custom or the Second Band Custom?
Evidence_Assessment: Referendum Band Custom approved by 83% of participating voters (113 out of 136); minor irregularities did not affect outcome; Second Band Custom passed by show of hands without clear consensus
Decision_Outcome: Referendum Band Custom is valid; Applicants are rightful Chief and Councillors
Burden_of_Proof: On Respondents to demonstrate validity of Second Band Custom or invalidity of Referendum Band Custom
Credibility_Factor: High voter participation in referendum (113/136); documented voting results vs. lack of recorded support for show of hands
Legal_Rule: Band customs must reflect a broad consensus among band members under the Indian Act
Procedural_Issue: Two conflicting elections held under different customs creating uncertainty
Grounds_for_Claim: Invalidity of Second Band Custom due to lack of consensus and procedural irregularities
Review_Standard: Judicial review under Federal Courts Act
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Referendum process was fair and transparent; Second Band Custom process lacked transparency
Key_Evidence_Considered: Voter turnout and results from referendum (113/136), total eligible voters (267), nature of approval (show of hands vs. ballot)
Applicant_Challenge: Challenge to legitimacy of council elected under Second Band Custom
Court_Result: Applicants declared legitimate Chief and Councillors
Defendant_Response: Support for Second Band Custom through show of hands; challenge to referendum validity
Evidence_Type: Documentary evidence (referendum results), oral proceedings (show of hands)
Remedy_Requested: Declarations and writ of quo warranto
Outcome: Applicants recognized as legitimate council; Respondents' claim invalidated
Remedy_Sought: Declaration of valid custom and rightful office holders; removal of unlawful office holders
Resolution_Mechanism: Judicial review and writ of quo warranto
Legal_Provision: Section of Indian Act on band customs; Federal Courts Act provisions on judicial review
Authority: Federal Court jurisdiction under Federal Courts Act
Claimant_Status: Applicants claiming rightful election under valid custom
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Allegation of improper procedure in Second Band Custom adoption
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Judicial review application seeking declarations and writ
Governing_Rule: Band custom must reflect broad consensus among band members
